sections.title: Setup
sections.text:
Create an account here: https://exception-cheats.net/auth/signup

Download our support tool here: https://mega.nz/file/ioJQ3TAK#khDxBBZ0_LiX__6zEnfr2N6PG1_HDuv271J5rFus7yQ

Make everything green in the support tool before downloading the loader!

sections.title: Instructions
sections.text:
Video Tutorial: https://youtu.be/_z3O7YM7TTU

Before downloading, make sure all antivirusâ€™s are disabled on your computer and any 3rd party anticheats such as FACEIT or RIOT VANGUARD are uninstalled

sections.title: Troubleshooting
sections.text:
Initialization Failure
Open cmd.exe as admin, type the following bcdedit /set hypervisorlaunchtype off, hit enter and restart PC

Disable TPM in bios
Restart your computer and enter the BIOS setup by pressing the appropriate key during startup. ...
Navigate to the Security or Advanced tab using the arrow keys.
Look for the TPM (Trusted Platform Module) option and select it.
Choose the option to disable (or enable) the TPM.
Save your changes and exit the BIOS setup.
Restart your computer.
